name: How Well Do You Know Jack? Quiz | Words Within Words | 10 Questions

questions.text: Something excellent OR a sweet snack?
questions.explanation:
crackerjack & cracker jack.

	Cracker Jack the snack (made of popcorn, molasses, and peanuts) was introduced at the Chicago World's Fair in 1893. It was immortalized in the song "Take Me out to the Ballgame": "...Buy me some peanuts and Cracker Jack...." Did you know there is fat free CJ available now?

jackboots & jackboot.

	These are shiny black leather boots that extend to the knee or higher.

questions.text: To steal someone's vehicle when the driver is still in it?
questions.explanation:
carjack & car jack & hijack.

	Carjack comes from hijack, but my dictionary says hijack's etymology is unknown.

Jack Russell.

	Apparently the name will be changed to Parson Russell Terrier in 2003. This is the name of the founder of the Jack Russell Terrier Association of America. Personally, I like Jack better than Parson. That cute dog on "Frasier" is a Jack Russell terrier.

questions.text: You can buy a fancy Swiss Army one?
questions.explanation:
jackknife & jack knife.

	Also the name for a kind of dive in which the diver opens and shuts like a jackknife. Swiss Army knives often have little saws, ice-picks, scissors, toothpicks, corkscrews, and even forks and spoons! In the 60s and 70s, many Baby Boomers carried them everywhere. Can't take them on planes these days, obviously!

questions.text: Any of various fishes OR a sailboat?
questions.explanation:
skipjack & skip jack.

	There are skipjack tuna; ladyfish and bluefish are called skipjacks, too.

questions.correct: yellowjacket & yellow jacket & yellow-jacket & blackjacket & black jacket & black-jacket
questions.explanation:
yellowjacket & yellow jacket & yellow-jacket & blackjacket & black jacket & black-jacket.

	Unlike honeybees, these wasps can sting multiple times. They have flashy yellow and black stripes to warn predators not to mess with them.

questions.text: A tropical tree with bluish-purple flowers? (This is cheating, a bit--no K in this one!)
questions.explanation:
jacaranda.

	Jacaranda trees grow all over Los Angeles, where I grew up. They are very pretty.

cheapjack & cheap jack & cheap-jack.

	A guy who sells schlocky merchandise.

jackass & jack ass.

	Hope I didn't offend anybody with that one! A female donkey is called a "jenny."
